name: Aquilamonitor
tagline: Monitor for system elements like a server, program or application, with administrator console and reports .
body:
### Welcome to AquilaMonitor Pages.
Monitor for system elements like a server, program or application, with administrator console and reports. 

### Designer Templates
This application based on template  [SbAdmin2 with AngularJS](https://github.com/start-angular/sb-admin-angular)  

### Used Technologies
Java, Spring-boot, JPA, Restful Web Service, AngularJS, H2 database, SbAdmin2 with AngularJS, 

### Authors and Contributors
In 2015, we started to work with Mehmet Özkan YAVUZ (@moyavuz) on Pendik Belediyesi (@pendik) (@PendikBelediyesi)

####Then added to project these users; 
* Ömer Kara (@sensiusta)
* Tülay Soy (@tulaysoy)
* Merve Akkaya (@MerveAkkaya)
* İffet Caşkurlu (@iffetcaskurlu)

### Instruction

* First set idea SDK to Java - JDK 1.8
* Run ~/AquilaMonitor/src/main/java/tr/bel/pendik/aquilamonitor/StartupApp.java as a Main application
* after initialization completed  click browser and go to this page [http://localhost:1453/admin/index.html]
 - default username is admin
 - default password is 123456

that's all.
### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
